title: An act to amend Section 19332 of the Business and Professions Code, relating to medical cannabis.
content: The Medical Cannabis Regulation and Safety Act provides for the licensure and regulation of commercial activities relating to medical cannabis and establishes various types of state cultivator licenses to be issued to qualified applicants by the Department of Food and Agriculture. This bill would also provide for the issuance of a Type 1C, or “specialty cottage,” state cultivator license, as specified, by the Department of Food and Agriculture.
